product_name: Timbuk2 Shagg Bag Accessory Case - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Give your cell phone a warm fleece sweater to wear. It's the Shagg Bag Accessory Case in small, from Timbuk2, sized to hold an iPhone 5. Earbuds and cards can go in the zip pocket. Case is lined with luxurious faux fur to keep your electronics clean and protected. Front zip pocket holds earbuds, Bluetooth headset, cash, coins or whatever else fits. Rip-and-stick straps let you attach the case to your backpack or messenger bag straps. Closeout.
short_description: Give your cell phone a warm fleece sweater to wear. It's the Shagg Bag Accessory Case in small, from Timbuk2, sized to hold an iPhone 5. Earbuds and cards can go in the zip pocket.
